$ul: **custom**: The `custom` value is only for your custom references, you may use it to save additional attributes. The custom value is not used in any other place. This field may contain any datatype that you like: null (default), string, integer, boolean, object etc...
**label**: A name or a label for this resource. This is used in the user interface, may be empty.
**metadata**: Object of searchable metadata for this resource. Can be freely used to store metadata properties.
**time_created**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was created.
**time_updated**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was updated.
**proximity**: Strongest proximity of all 'child' presences. This is a rough estimate on the distance from the item to the receiver.
**technology**: Type of technology that was used to detect this item.
**time_created**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was created.
**time_updated**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was updated.
